Definition: Chip and pulp revenue per cell
Cost for suppression based on mean suppression effort per fire
Biomass removed for chip, pulp, and biofuel
Diffence in biomass between focal year and 2020
Timing of smoke emissions relative to the worst smoke days in each year
Distance to high severity from pixels that burned at lower severity

Metric: Percent mature forest area per HUC12
Definition: Area covered by forest greater than 50 years old

Metric: Area of old forest patches >10 ha
Definition: Area covered by large patches (>10 ha) of old forest (>120 yrs old)
Binary presence of old trees in each cell
Change in amount of offsite biomass compared to 2020
Patch area of homogeneous cover type and age class
Distance to nearest trees >20 yrs old
Number of age classes (40 yr bins) that occupy at least 5% area within each HUC12
Number of cover types that occupy at least 5% area within each HUC12
0 = same cover type as 2020, 1 = different cover type
0 = no change, forest. NA = no change, non-forest. -1 = forest to non-forest. 1 = non-forest to forest.
